org.drip.product.params

Class QuoteConvention

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.service.stream.Serializer
      • org.drip.product.params.QuoteConvention
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Validatable

    public class QuoteConvention
extends Serializer
implements Validatable
    Contains the Component Market Convention Parameters - the quote convention, the calculation type, the first settle date, and the redemption amount.

        Constructs the Market Convention object from the quoting convention, the calculation type, the first settle date, and the redemption value.

        quotingParams - Quoting Params
        strCalculationType - Calculation Type
        dblFirstSettle - First Settle Date
        dblRedemptionValue - Redemption Value
        iSettleLag - Settle Lag
        strSettleCalendar - Settlement Calendar
        iSettleAdjustMode - Is Settle date business adjusted
